trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Prince George
There were no other sightings in Prince George on or around August 30th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsThere was a bright flash of white light. then another flash a bit lower in a straight line then another but further down not in a rythmic flashing, it was random as far as distance but in a straight down pattern. Then it moved upward in straight line one final flash and was gone.
Summary: bright flash of white light, descending,not in a rhythmic flashing then ascending
